assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Not applicable to this study and paper. The Columbia University Department of Psychiatry/New York State Psychiatric Institute Institutional Review Board approved the study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: We obtained informed consent from all of the participants. We thank the study participants for giving their time and perspective.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.
